import React from 'react' import SingleAnswers from './SingleAnswers' import SingleAnswerView from './SingleAnswerView' import { useQuestions, useQuiz } from '../../contexts/ContextProvider' import { useQuizChange } from '../../contexts/ContextProvider' import { useChange } from '../../contexts/ContextProvider' export default function Single(props) { const handleChange = useChange(); const quizData = useQuiz(); const handleQuizChange = useQuizChange(); const questionData = useQuestions(); function handle(e) { handleChange(e) updateQuestion(0, questionData) } return (
) }
